entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
